On this page

Activation Methods Chart ​

Below is a comparison of activation methods offered by Microsoft Activation Scripts.

Basics ​

HWIDOhookKMS38Online KMSZeroCID[1]StaticCID[1:1]KMS4k[1:2]
Works offline🔴🟢🟢🔴🟢🔴🟢
Activation is permanent🟢🟢🟢[2]🟢[3]🟢🟢🟢[4]
Does not leave any files in the system to maintain activation status🟢🔴🟢🔴🟢🟢🟢

Persistence ​

HWIDOhookKMS38Online KMSZeroCID[1:3]StaticCID[1:4]KMS4k[1:5]
Persists between hardware changes🔴🟢🔴🟢🟢🔴🟢
Persists between clean installations on the same hardware🟢🔴🔴🔴🔴🔴🔴
Persists between Windows 10 / 11 feature upgrades🟢🟢🟢🟢🔴🔴🔴

Support ​

HWIDOhookKMS38Online KMSZeroCID[1:6]StaticCID[1:7]KMS4k[1:8]
Windows Vista / 7🔴🔴🔴🟢[5]🟢🔴🟢[5:1]
Windows 8 / 8.1🔴🔴🔴🟢[5:2]🟢🟢🟢[5:3]
Windows 10 / 11🟢🔴🟢[5:4]🟢[5:5]🟢🟢🟢[5:6]
Windows 11 (26100.4188 and later)🟢🔴🟢[5:7]🟢[5:8]🔴🟢🟢[5:9]
Windows Server 2008 / 2008 R2🔴🔴🔴🟢🟢🔴🟢
Windows Server 2012 / 2012 R2🔴🔴🔴🟢🟢🟢🟢
Windows Server 2016 and later🔴🔴🟢🟢🟢🟢🟢
Office 2010🔴🟢🔴🟢[5:10]🔴🔴🔴
Office 2013 and later🔴🟢🔴🟢[5:11]🟢[6]🟢[6:1]🟢[5:12] [6:2]
Windows / Office KMS Host🔴🔴🔴🔴🟢🟢🔴
Windows Extended Security Updates🔴🔴🔴🔴🟢🟢🔴
OCUR / RP / APPXLOB addons🔴🔴🔴🔴🟢🟢🔴

  1. Provided by TSforge. ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎

  2. Valid until the year 2038. ↩︎

  3. Valid for 180 days by default. Permanent with renewal task installed. ↩︎

  4. Valid for 4083 years. ↩︎

  5. Volume activation capable editions only. ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎

  6. Supported only on Windows 8 and later; subscription editions are not supported. ↩︎ ↩︎ ↩︎
